participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.background: I read a lot and spend my time on community activities. I have broken my arm twice. I work in retail. I try to keep in touch with my family, but I can be busy with school and my job. I look dapper while walking my clients' dogs.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.background: The weather is unpredictable, just like life. I am a student. I am an only child, but I have a large extended family who are all supportive of my dance team. My family loves spending time outdoors with our dog. My favorite book is The Little Prince because it reminds me of my dog.

content.text: Not much. Trying to finish my homework before I go to dance practice.
Nice! I like to read and spend time on community activities.
That sounds fun. I love reading too! My favorite book is The Little Prince.
Oh I love that book! I also like to read The Giving Tree.
I love that book too! It's so sad but so beautiful.
It is! I also love to spend time on community activities. I volunteer at my local animal shelter.
That's awesome! I love animals. I have a dog named Bailey and a cat named Mittens.
Aww, that sounds cute! I have a dog named Charlie.
I love dogs! They're the best pets.
I agree! What kind of dance team do you do?
I do hip hop. It's so much fun and I love the energy.
That sounds great! I wish I could dance.
It's not too late to learn! You should try it out.
I might! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! Have a great day!
